name.value: HSPC Pulmonary Embolism Severity Index Interpretation Value Set

description.value: The set of codes, taken from Intermountain Healthcare HDD, that describe the interpretation of the pulmonary embolism severity index total score.

display.value: Class I, Very Low Risk :0-1.6% 30-day mortality in this group.

definition.value: A determination of the risk level of 0 to 1.6% of mortality within 30 days due to pulmonary embolism.
